name: Night Forest
description: The game gonna put you face to face with lots of dangers on the way to save your friend. Saws, lasers, turtles and lots of other things gonna make you enraged and break down your monitor screen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
